7oTL_Y-A_IU#2#PL_oohi_O51Z_lORk8SCG_4x1s: Financial Education website provides easy access to free educational materials a resource search engine for teachers and games for students of various ages and now it's levels some of the 12 reserve banks around the country are for economic and financial economic education workshops for teachers and several Reserve Bank periodically provide lessons in personal finance to middle and high school students

the number of the reserve bank's also run academic competitions for the middle school high school and college students such as the FED challenge econ bowl and other essay contest I've had the opportunity in a few cases to judge in this room the finals of the FED challenge which is a opportunity for kids to learn what the FED does learn about the economy is a great experience and I've seen some really impressive performances from up from high school kids
also some reserve banks of open Learning Centers or museums in their lobbies that feature interactive exhibits
